about_the_game:
Welcome to a haunting world steeped in mystery and sorrow, where a once vibrant town now stands desolate, its streets silent and its buildings echoing with the ghosts of the past. All that remains are the memories of long vanished children, lured away by the Piper's haunting melody. Now, as the last one remaining in this desolate landscape, the mayor beckons you forth, entrusting you with a perilous quest: to venture into the depths of this twisted reality, rescue the lost children, and unravel the mysteries lurking within the shadows. Prepare to embark on a journey of courage, determination, and discovery in a world where the echoes of the Piper's flute still linger.

  • Hundreds of Handcrafted and Challenging Rooms: Navigate through meticulously designed levels filled with precision platforming challenges, each crafted to test your skills and reflexes.

  • Jump, Run, and Roll Mechanics: Master the core gameplay mechanics of jumping, running, and rolling as you traverse the world, utilizing precise timing and skillful maneuvers to overcome obstacles, hazards and enemies.

  • Seamless World: Immerse yourself in a seamlessly interconnected world. Explore distinct environments, each with its own unique obstacles, enemies, and secrets to uncover.

  • Boss Battles: Challenge formidable bosses scattered throughout the world, each with their own unique mechanics and patterns to master.

  • Unlock Powers: Uncover hidden abilities, giving you new ways to traverse the world, empowering you to access previously inaccessible areas and overcome new challenges.

  • Rescue Town Folks: Venture into the darkness to find and save some of the long-lost children.

  • Challenge yourself: Find and unlock the most difficult challenges, pushing your skills to the limit.

  • Dark Atmosphere: Experience a gripping and atmospheric narrative set in a world shrouded in darkness, where every corner hides lurking dangers and secrets waiting to be revealed. Handcrafted environments and limited colors, as well as the atmospheric soundtrack with its haunting melodies, set the dark tone of this game world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: A precision platformer where you master your skills to unveil the dark secrets of a strange and twisted universe. Jump, run, and roll through hundreds of handcrafted challenges in a sprawling, interconnected world.
